description:
If user is admin or just has several project in database and uses openstack api, there is no way to use certain project you want, because project id coded like that:
accounts = self.auth.get_projects(user=user)
...
account = accounts[0]

UPD:
Changed related branch.
I leave support for old style working without project id header, bun I'm not sure it will be needed.
title: openstack api has problem to work with certain project

comments.content:
If user is admin or just has several project in database and uses openstack api, there is no way to use certain project you want, because project id coded like that:
accounts = self.auth.get_projects(user=user)
...
account = accounts[0]
I suggest use project id like in ec2 api: https://code.launchpad.net/~usrleon/nova/nova-api-creds
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~usrleon
